document.docAuthor: Moore, Michael D., Beaver, Ethan P., Velasco-Castrillón, Alejandro & Stevens, Mark I.
document.docTitle: Abantiades kayi Moore & Beaver & Velasco-Castrillón & Stevens 2020, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Four new tri-forked species of the Australian genus Abantiades Herrich-Schäffer (Lepidoptera: Hepialidae) from the “ dark obscura clade ”
